SELECT CC.LAST, CC.THAT, ROUND((CC.CNT / 3), 1) AS AVG, CC.CNT FROM (SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(RGSTRTN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1), 'YYYY-MM') THEN 1 END) LAST, COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(RGSTRTN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM') THEN 1 END) THAT, COUNT(CASE WHEN RGSTRTN_DATE BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-3) AND SYSDATE THEN 1 END) AVG, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM CLNT_CMPNY CC INNER JOIN EMP E ON CC.EMP_NUM = E.EMP_NUM INNER JOIN APNTM A ON E.EMP_NUM = A.EMP_NUM WHERE DEL_CHECK IS NULL
AND A.DEPT_NUM = 7
AND A.DEPT_NUM = 8
AND E.EMP_NAME LIKE '%' || #{mngEmp} || '%'
) CC

SELECT EC.LAST, EC.THAT, ROUND((EC.CNT / 3), 1) AS AVG, EC.CNT FROM (SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(RGSTRTN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1), 'YYYY-MM') THEN 1 END) LAST, COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(RGSTRTN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM') THEN 1 END) THAT, COUNT(CASE WHEN RGSTRTN_DATE BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-3) AND SYSDATE THEN 1 END) AVG, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM ENTRPRS_CLNT EC INNER JOIN EMP E ON EC.MNGR_EMP_NUM = E.EMP_NUM INNER JOIN APNTM A ON E.EMP_NUM = A.EMP_NUM WHERE DEL_CHECK IS NULL
AND A.DEPT_NUM = 7
AND A.DEPT_NUM = 8
AND E.EMP_NAME LIKE '%' || #{mngEmp} || '%'
) EC

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN GRADE_NUM = '0' THEN 1 END) AS GRADENUM0, COUNT(CASE WHEN GRADE_NUM = '1' THEN 1 END) AS GRADENUM1, COUNT(CASE WHEN GRADE_NUM = '2' THEN 1 END) AS GRADENUM2, COUNT(CASE WHEN GRADE_NUM = '3' THEN 1 END) AS GRADENUM3, COUNT(CASE WHEN GRADE_NUM = '4' THEN 1 END) AS GRADENUM4 FROM CLNT_CMPNY WHERE DEL_CHECK IS NULL

SELECT COUNT(A.DEPT_NUM) CNT, COUNT(CASE WHEN A.DEPT_NUM = 7 THEN 1 END) CNT1, COUNT(CASE WHEN A.DEPT_NUM = 8 THEN 1 END) CNT2 FROM ENTRPRS_CLNT EC INNER JOIN EMP E ON EC.MNGR_EMP_NUM = E.EMP_NUM INNER JOIN APNTM A ON E.EMP_NUM = A.EMP_NUM WHERE DEL_CHECK IS NULL
AND A.DEPT_NUM = 7
AND A.DEPT_NUM = 8
AND E.EMP_NAME LIKE '%' || #{mngEmp} || '%'
